thread.title: Dispatches from the rehearsal room: Take a peek at the Strictly Come Dancing 2015 couples in training
thread.title_full: Dispatches from the rehearsal room: Take a peek at the Strictly Come Dancing 2015 couples in training

title: Dispatches from the rehearsal room: Take a peek at the Strictly Come Dancing 2015 couples in training
text:
Dispatches from the rehearsal room: Take a peek at the Strictly Come Dancing 2015 couples in training Dispatches from the rehearsal room: Take a peek at the Strictly Come Dancing 2015 couples in training 
  
We’ve seen dance one, and dance two is well in the works as the Strictly Come Dancing couples psyche themselves up for Saturday night. 
Luckily, the power of the internet means we get a sneak peek of the celebrities in training – through their social media posts. Peter Andre, Jeremy Vine, Jay McGuiness, Ainsley Harriott, Daniel O’Donnell, Iwan Thomas and Anthony Ogogo (Guy Levy/BBC) 
Here’s a round-up of how things are going in rehearsal rooms across the country: Anita Rani and Gleb Savchenko 
Countryfile presenter Anita and her partner Gleb have been using the hashtag #teamGLITA, which is like glitter… and like their names… got it yet? 
The new professional seems to be taking an unorthodox approach to training, apparently ordering Anita into a cold bath. My @bbcstrictly homework tonight from @Gleb_Savchenko to have an ICE bath. The cold tap is running as I type – is this a good idea? 
— anita rani (@itsanitarani) September 29, 2015 Sorry #hackney the screams were me getting into an ice bath. Freezing my ass off @Gleb_Savchenko #nopainnogain pic.twitter.com/DzFKc6cgAx 
— anita rani (@itsanitarani) September 29, 2015 
Their warm-up song is Eye Of The Tiger, which is a very good call. Promoted stories Anthony Ogogo and Oti Mabuse 
These two have been working hard, as evidenced by this photo of them zonked on the floor. Ainsley Harriott and Natalie Lowe 
We bet rehearsals with TV chef Ainsley are fun. At 58, he’s the oldest in the competition – but also one of the most enthusiastic. 
— Natalie Lowe (@RealNatalieLowe) September 11, 2015 Carol Kirkwood and Pasha Kovalev 
Carol seems to be taking rehearsals with a healthy sense of humour – and scepticism: . @PashaKovalev you are having a laugh! I'll need a crane to get my leg that high!!xxx pic.twitter.com/rPWAzFI5Kn 
— Carol Kirkwood (@carolkirkwood) October 1, 2015 . @PashaKovalev get your steel capped boots on honey! Be with you in 10 ;0)xxx 
— Carol Kirkwood (@carolkirkwood) October 1, 2015 It's so hard working with @PashaKovalev … NOT!xxx pic.twitter.com/9lLtNWSks0 
— Carol Kirkwood (@carolkirkwood) September 16, 2015 Daniel O’Donnell and Kristina Rihanoff 
Little has been seen from the O’Donnell-Rihanoff rehearsal room, but it looks like they had a very nice tea-time with Daniel’s wife. Had the loveliest day out and about with @Majodonnell and Daniel O'Donnell! The charleston is progressing amazingly! pic.twitter.com/fsT39LebTl 
— Kristina Rihanoff (@KRihanoff) September 30, 2015 Georgia May Foote and Giovanni Pernice 
But what’s this from #TeamGG? “Ola Jordan and Iwan decided to try and sabotage our rehearsals today! Go away!!”, said Georgia, alongside a photo of Iwan flashing his chest at the camera. What hijinks. 
Their training looks pretty manic, though. This is the reaction when @georgiafoote realized there is one day left @bbcstrictly !! #teamgg pic.twitter.com/JbtUGMY1W1 
— Giovanni Pernice (@pernicegiovann1) September 23, 2015 Helen George and Aljaz Skorjanec 
Aljaz reports that Helen is “working the props like a pro” in this picture, but we’re not convinced. Iwan Thomas and Ola Jordan 
Iwan has been revelling in getting some new gear… Never thought I could be excited about receiving new dance shoes…. I've changed #BillyElliot pic.twitter.com/aTKZX2WxHY 
— Iwan Thomas MBE (@Iwanrunner) October 1, 2015 
Getting dressed up… 
And getting his partner a birthday present. My perfect birthday present from my perfect partner @Iwanrunner @bbcstrictly 😂💃🏼🏃🏼 pic.twitter.com/H48hu87Rhg 
— Ola Jordan (@The_OlaJordan) October 1, 2015 Jamelia and Tristan MacManus 
Jamelia and Tristan have shared little from the rehearsal room, but we can tell they’re working hard from this post: Jay McGuiness and Aliona Vilani 
Jay has absolutely, definitely got the hang of the waltz. Probably. Our Waltz with @JayMcGuiness is totally ready 😆😎👊🏼👊🏼👫 pic.twitter.com/wN2LjSvoGZ 
— Aliona Kavanagh (@AlionaVilani) September 30, 2015 Jeremy Vine and Karen Clifton 
Poor Karen has been having to miss the Great British Bake Off for training with Jeremy. But! The dance is complete. Missing #GBBO .. Training intensely w @theJeremyVine till 10pm but also thinking about cakes!! #ilovecakes 
— Karen Clifton (@karen_hauer) September 30, 2015 Annnndddd I'm happy. Got my wallet,got my mind and @theJeremyVine and I have got our dance done! Now time to practice it 522 times … 
— Karen Clifton (@karen_hauer) September 30, 2015 Katie Derham and Anton du Beke 
The Katie and Anton practice room remains a mystery, which is a shame, because we bet it’s really, really fun. You guys are all GREAT! Thank you so much for so many wonderful comments about strictly last night. That @TheAntonDuBeke is good, isn't he?! 
— Katie Derham (@thekatiederham) September 27, 2015 Kellie Bright and Kevin Clifton 
EastEnders star Kellie has been doing her homework. I am actually cha cha cha'ing around my living room while my husband is watching Entourage…. What has happened to me @keviclifton ???? 
— Kellie Bright (@kelliebright76) September 30, 2015 Kirsty Gallacher and Brendan Cole 
Kirsty and Brendan participated in ‘Take Your Professional Dance Partner To Work Day’ 
— Kirsty Gallacher (@TheRealKirstyG) September 29, 2015 Peter Andre and Janette Manrara 
…While Peter Andre and Janette Manrara got ahead in the selfie game. Our #Strictly celebs are back in training hoping they won’t be the first pair to leave. See them in training here! https://t.co/jYM6yIuxIt Share article 
— BBC Strictly (@bbcstrictly) October 1, 2015 Promoted Stories
